title: Reliability Consulting Services
text: Shirethechnik helps its clients to build products of high reliability and to deliver world-class products and services.
contact: To discuss your reliability analysis requirements, please

sub_sections.text1: Our team has combined expertise in almost all areas of reliability and quality engineering with experience that spans a wide-spectrum of product types.
Using a highly-structured process to manage our projects we ensure our work is delivered on time and to budget so long term relationships with the companies we serve.

sub_sections.subtitle: Shirethechnik offers the following reliability services:
list: Failure Mode Effects and Criticality Analysis
